FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Intergalactic Market
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: From here, ships fly in and deposit their goods and replace their cargo before returning home. +40 tithe modifier, +15% basetax.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Glitterworld Research Facility
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: From this building, researchers equipped with the highest-grade tools search for the answers of the universe. +50% Modifier to research production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Automated Defense Systems
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Androids roam the streets, keeping the colonists safe from external and internal harm. +2 military level. 400 Silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Food Reconstruction
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Nobody likes nutrient paste, but with a little flavoring and cosmetic tweaks, it can look and taste like whatever you want it to! +50% food production. 400 silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Mechanoid Salvage Shop
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: With the right tools, you can do more than shred dead mechanoids, you can salvage their tech to use against them. +.5 base weapons production. +5% military conbat efficiency.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Clothing Printers
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Remove the human element altogether! Dump raw materials in and watch as each article of clothing is printed as a single, seamless piece! +50% apparel production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Synthetic Wood Factory
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: It's new! It's space-age! It's just as good as the real thing and it's definitely not vinyl, we swear! +.5 base logging production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Asteroid Magnet
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: People may not like it, but it's hard to deny the amount of resources gathered when you just pull the metals you want out of the sky. +20% mining production. -.5 happiness per day. +.5 unrest per day.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Worker Bots
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Put robots to work doing the more mundane tasks around the colony so the people can be put to work elsewhere. +10 max workers. +7 overmax workers. 400 silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Subliminal Message Center
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Weave subliminal messaging into the settlement's local broadcasts. +.5 loyalty per day. -.5 unrest per day. 400 silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Cloning Lab
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Why breed or capture animals when you can just grow them in vats? +.5 base animal production. +.25 base research. 400 silver per tax period upkeep.
